node.title: Species diversity of the invasice Callery pear, _Pyrus calleryana_ (part 1)
node.summary: Our paper on species diversity of Callery pear (invasive in US) to be published in MDPI Life.

node.title: 30th USDA Interagency Research Forum on Invasive Species
node.summary: With my student Shiwnai Sapkota, we attended the exciting Forum on Invasive Species in Annapolis, MD.
